hackathon-description-text: Duckhacks is an annual competition held every year during the Spring semester at Stevens. In addition to the competition, there are also workshops and networking opportunities.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Software Engineering Professor @ Stevens Institute of Technology
Computer and Electrical Engineering Professor @ Stevens Institute of Technology

hackathon-eligibility:
Be a student at Stevens Institute of Technology
Be of any major, any graduating class and any level (grad or undergrad)
Be ready to have a 
Teams must be 1-4 people
hackathon-requirements: Submission must be made on top to the Devpost
hackathon-rules: All work must be only made by your team (you can use libraries)

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: JP Morgan Code for Good Challenge

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Babbio Center, 525 River Street, Hoboken, NJ 07030, USA
hackathon-location-address: Babbio Center, 525 River Street, Hoboken, NJ 07030, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create apps that blow us away!
